BleepingComputer has spotted cryptocurrency scams popping up on BlueSky just as the decentralized microblogging service surpassed 20 million users this week. [...]

新的 Ghost Tap 攻击滥用 NFC 移动支付来窃取资金https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-ghost-tap-attack-abuses-nfc-mobile- payments-to-steal-money/ Wed, 20 Nov 2024 11:44:42 -0500比尔·图拉斯SecurityMobile https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/new-ghost-tap-attack-abuses-nfc-mobile- payments-to-steal-money/ Cybercriminals have devised a novel method to cash out from stolen credit card details linked to mobile payment systems such as Apple Pay and Google Pay, dubbed 'Ghost Tap,' which relays NFC card data to money mules worldwide.
